required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Ultrasound Study of Entheses and Small Joints of Hands and Feet in Patients With Atypical Form of Psoriasis
clinical_study.official_title: Systematic Descriptive Experimental Ultrasound Study of Entheses and Small Joints of Hands and Feet in Patients Presenting an Atypical Form of Psoriasis

brief_summary.textblock: Systematic study of the ultrasound infringements of tendons chest expanders of entheses the most involved in spondylarthropathies and small joints of hands and feet in expanding patients of psoriasis to estimate if there is an infra-clinical infringement of the psoriasic rheumatism .

primary_outcome.measure: Infra clinical infringements of the entheses
primary_outcome.description: Measurement of the thickness in millimeters (mm) in anteroposterior diameter of each entheses (quadricipatal tendon, calcaneal tendon and plantar aponeurosis)

primary_outcome.measure: Infra clinical infringements of the nails
primary_outcome.description: Measurement mm of the nail plate and matrix of the nail. It will be evaluate by using power Doppler the vascularisation in 3 grades of the nail ( grade 0=normal, grade 1=moderate vascularisation , grade 3:= abnormal vascularisation)

clinical_study.condition: Ultrasound in Patients With Atypical Shape of Psoriasis

study_pop.textblock: Major patient with atypical cutaneous psoriasis consultant at University Hospital of Brest

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Patients over 18 years
- Atypical psoriasis of the scalp and / or nails and / or psoriasis of folds
- Patient agreeing to participate in the study
Exclusion Criteria:
- Psoriatic arthritis
- Rheumatic pain
- Arthritis
- Joint Trauma in hands, elbows knees, feet
- Current treatment with methotrexate, soriatane, cyclosporine, corticosteroids
- Current treatment with biological therapy (anti-TNF, anti IL 12-23)
- Previous history of rheumatic disease: inflammatory, microcrystalline, osteoarthritis
- Patients in physical or mental incapacity to agree
